title: EMERGENCY POD: Reacting to the brand new Celebrity Treasure Island supertease
content:encoded:
In this extra special emergency episode, we dissect the strange new supertease for the upcoming season of Celebrity Treasure Island which includes Matootles in tears and Tāme Iti calling someone a dumbass.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
